about_the_game:
Artemis, a struggling writer who doesn't believe in himself. On July 7, 1947, he finds a mysterious pocket watch on his porch. He thinks nothing of it until something happens to his neighbour, and all of a sudden time has restarted to when he woke up. Can Artemis find out the source of the time loop and figure out how to break it?

Game Features

-Figure out what in Artemis's routine must change to progress forward.

-Meet Artemis's cheerful neighbour named Melody, who is always ready to help.

-Immerse yourself in the 1940s aesthetic.

-Narrative Driven Experience

-A free time-loop game where every reset reveals a new layer of the mystery.

Presented by JBOStudios and brought to life by the brilliant mind of the solo-developer at Soul Narrative Games, this experience sheds new light on the time loop genre!

Artemis, a struggling writer who doesn't believe in himself. On July 7, 1947, he finds a mysterious pocket watch on his porch. He thinks nothing of it until something happens to his neighbour, and all of a sudden time has restarted to when he woke up. Can Artemis find out the source of the time loop and figure out how to break it?

name: The Void Chronicles Chronis

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or faster
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-530 or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Every decision matters. It’s a race against the clock in a story where paranoia, creativity, and courage are your only allies. Will you break the loop, or will time break you?
